dmca.title: DMCA Notification - Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: ThinningScalp.com [mailto:legal@thinningscalp.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 27, 2007 3:07 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA Notification - Copyright Infringement

DMCA Notification

March 27, 2007

James M. Merritt, Jr.
820 Jerilyn Drive
Charlotte, N.C. 28212

RE: Theft of Writings From ThinningScalp.com

Hello The Planet,

We have previously contacted The Pharma Web http://www.thepharmaweb.com 
to remove writings stolen from our web site 
http://www.thinningscalp.com . The stolen material appears on the page 
below. Pharma Web has ignored our complaint. This type of duplication 
can harm our rankings and cash flow in search engines such as Google, 
Yahoo, Ask, and MSN. Such sites as this have made it practically 
impossible to place new materials on the Internet because of their 
hunger for Google Adsense monies. This "slice and dice" infringement 
has become rampant.

http://www.thepharmaweb.com/healthcare/95*444*%20Of%20Thinning%20Hair%
20Inherited*666*.html

Portions of Stolen Content

So what's the secret to preventing thinning hair and the impending 
female thinning hair and male pattern baldness that may accompany it? 
Basically you need an understanding of thinning hair prevention and 
treatments or remedies that enhance hair growth. What leading experts 
often fail to mention is there is an internal and external component to 
DHT production that causes thinning hair. In other words external 
enzymes produced on the scalp must unite with internally produced 
components in the body to produce this DHT, which is responsible for 
your thinning hair. So in effect by blocking one or both of the 
channels for DHT production you can in effect deter the resultant 
thinning hair and create hair growth. 

DMCA Notification Statement 

" I have a good faith belief that use of the copyright materials 
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized 
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear under penalty of 
perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that 
I am the the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the 
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Your attention to this matter is appreciated.


Regards, 
James M. Merritt, Jr.
legal@thinningscalp.com
